name: The Flying Postman
description:
Freefall your way through funky levels to deliver packages between two cities

"What's the shortest path from A to B?"

Straight through the planet is our answer when you need something delivered really fast and in style.

Here are some helpful gameplay tips:

  1. Grab all packages and jump down the chute.
  2. Follow waypoints so you don't end up somewhere weird, like "DEAD END" or "Probably Australia?". 
  3. Try not to crash too much maybe.
  4. We're sorry about level 5.

Controls

  1. WASD/Left Analog - movement
  2. Space - jump
